heading: Today
text: 1 to 3 inches in the St. Lawrence Valley, 3 to 6 inches south through the Champlain Basin, into the northern Green Mountains and Eastern Townships, and 6 to 10 inches east and south, locally up to a foot. Highs in the 20s north to near 32 south.  Winds south to southeast near 10 mph, light in wind-sheltered valleys.

heading: Snow spreading northeast, becoming moderate to heavy south of the Adirondacks and Rt. 2.  Storm totals
text: 1 to 3 inches in the St. Lawrence Valley, 3 to 6 inches south through the Champlain Basin, into the northern Green Mountains and Eastern Townships, and 6 to 10 inches east and south, locally up to a foot. Highs in the 20s north to near 32 south.  Winds south to southeast near 10 mph, light in wind-sheltered valleys.

heading: Tonight
text: Evening snow, mainly from VT east, and from Rt. 2 south, tapering off.  Some clearing after midnight, last through the mountains.  Lows from 10 to 20 north to south.  Winds northeast up to 10 mph, becoming northwest and increasing to 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Wednesday
text: Any early clouds north giving way to sun, then mixing with afternoon clouds. Highs in the upper 20s to low 30s.  Winds northwest near 10 mph west of the Green Mountains, 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph east, diminishing to less than 10 mph, and becoming southwest.
